name: sfchronicle
text: The number of people hospitalized with COVID-19 in the nine-county Bay Area hit 578 on Saturday, according to the latest state figures. That‚Äôs another record high, up from 567 a day earlier. https://t.co/56L1De899q

name: sfchronicle
text:

name: sfchronicle
text:

name: sfchronicle
text: @OtisrTaylorJr is sitting down with leaders of some of the Bay Area‚Äôs largest protests. Hear about why they took to the streets, how they marshaled their communities and the changes they want to see in the Bay Area of the future. Reserve your spot: https://t.co/wyXNhvMbW1

name: sfchronicle
text:
RT @SFC_Culture: Over the last four months, our lives have been fundamentally altered. We don‚Äôt always recognize history-making moments while we‚Äôre in them, but right now it‚Äôs clear.

So, how could we use this moment to reshape our region for the better?https://t.co/7gbVAn0bee

name: sfchronicle
text: A vaccine alone will likely not allow many functions ‚Äî from crowded stadiums to beloved cable cars ‚Äî to resume. And even if scientists find a vaccine that works and is safe, it may take a long time to reach everyone who needs it. https://t.co/lPAE45pk2A

name: sfchronicle
text: RT @SFC_Datebook: Alameda blacksmith Shawn Lovell used ancient blacksmith tools to forge elaborate iron park gates for the Gardens at Lake Merritt. Read more about the installation here: https://t.co/DpI2gBvcru

name: sfchronicle
text: RT @SFC_FoodHome: The wine wunderkind, 36-year-old Jesse Katz, has had his hands in several of high-profile projects over the last decade. Now, he's opening a tasting room in Healdsburg, which will be the official home base for his own label, Aperture. https://t.co/2tRSKNEht5

name: sfchronicle
text: The guiding theory of the micro-hood concept is this: transforming downtown office space to serve San Francisco‚Äôs gaping need for low-cost housing and injecting lifeblood into the city‚Äôs urban core. https://t.co/CmU7hhYuyc

name: sfchronicle
text: San Francisco‚Äôs annual Fleet Week has been canceled, organizers recently said. Tickets for the 2020 show will be honored at next year‚Äôs event. https://t.co/abUs9PRNZy
